title: Bring Your Own IP (BYOIP)
description: Import your own public IP addresses, and use them on eligible OVHcloud services.
rir_selection_title: Select your RIR - Regional Internet Registry
rir_selection_description: Select the RIR that manages your public IP addresses.
rir_selection_ARIN_description: The American Registry for Internet Numbers (ARIN)
rir_selection_RIPE_description: Regional Internet Registry for Europe, Middle East and Central Asia (RIPE NCC)
region_selection_description: A region is the set of datacentres you can move your IP addresses to. The list of datacentres that make up a region is displayed below. You must select the region where your services will be located.
region_token_description: To confirm that you are the owner of the IP address range you want to import, you must update the WHOIS entry for your IP range using the token below. The token must appear in a specific field of the WHOIS object (see below), on a dedicated line. The token must be added before placing the order, and must remain in place until the service is delivered.
region_token_description_1: For RIPE, edit the ‘descr’ field of the ‘inetnum’ object of the IP address.
region_token_description_2: For ARIN, edit the ‘Public Comments’ field of the ‘Network’ object.
region_token_description_3: For APNIC, edit the “remarks” field of the “inetnum” object (or the ‘aut-num’ object when used as a number).
ip_range_selection_description: Specify the IP address range you want to import (the range size must be between /19 and /24). If the range size is greater than /24, the address range will be segmented into a contiguous set of /24 size ranges
ip_byoip_as_system_description: Choose the AS with which to advertise your IP address block over the internet
ip_byoip_as_rir_title: Select the RIR that manages your AS number
ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_1: I am the owner of the IP address range I have entered.
ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_2: I agree to ensure that the IP address range entered is not announced on the internet by several networks simultaneously (multi-homing).
ip_byoip_disclaimer_description_point_3: This IP address range has a healthy reputation.
ip_byoip_disclaimer_ordering_delay_messa: Please note that this process might take around three weeks. We apologise for the inconvenience.
